{"id":1249633080,"question_id":3395,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1714880215,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1249633080/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Length of Anagram Concatenation","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minAnagramLength(String s) {\n        \n        \n        \n        for(int m=1; m<=s.length(); m++){\n            \n              int[] arr = new int[26];\n            \n            for(int i=0; i<m; i++){\n                arr[s.charAt(i)-'a']++;\n            }\n            \n            \n            \n            \n            \n            boolean mflag = true;\n            \n            for(int i=0; i<s.length(); i+=m){\n                \n                int[] tmp = new int[26];\n                \n                for(int j=i; j<i+m; j++){\n                    \n                    char ch = s.charAt(j);\n                    tmp[ch-'a']++;\n                    if(tmp[ch-'a']>arr[ch-'a']) break;\n                }\n                \n                boolean rt = check(arr, tmp);\n                // System.out.println(m+ \" \" + i + \" \" + rt);\n                if(rt==false){\n                    mflag = false;\n                    break;\n                }\n                \n            }\n            \n            if(mflag){\n                return m;\n            }\n           \n            \n            \n        }\n        \n        return s.length();\n        \n    }\n    \n    \n    private boolean check(int[] arr, int[] tmp){\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<26; i++){\n            if(arr[i]!=tmp[i]) return false;\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-length-of-anagram-concatenation","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
